alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Guthrie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 6:40PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Thunderstorms With Heavy Rainall Will Impact portions of northeastern Guthrie and northwestern Dallas Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 637 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Panorama, or 7 miles northeast of Guthrie Center, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rainfall of up to three inches may accompany the area of storms. Storm spotters north of Guthrie Center report 45 mph winds and rainfall of 1 to 2 inches in 30 minutes. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Ponding of ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. Locations impacted include... Perry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
